instruction: Analyze the performance of the MSCI ESG indexes during the coronavirus pandemic and provide updates on a monthly basis.
output: We have analyzed the performance of the MSCI ESG indexes for the past three months, from April to June, during the coronavirus pandemic and have noticed a consistent positive contribution from ESG across all four select indexes and regions. The longer-term performance has been similar to the performance during the pandemic. We will continue to monitor these indexes on a monthly basis and provide updates accordingly.
